posts.post_content:
Here's a New Listing from my Mellinger Collection, which is almost gone, I'm sad to say!

Neat provenance here: [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=t206[/url]


Offering this AMAZINGLY FRESH, CRISP & CLEAN example of JIM PASTORIUS, pitcher for the Brooklyn Superbas (Dodgers). Sporting NICE WHITE BORDERS, SPOTLESS both F & B and a picture that is as SHARP & IN-FOCUS as any you will ever find! It has the Sweet Caporal 150 Factory 25 reverse w/ CORNERS SHARP & WELL-DEFINED. Definitely a HI-GRADE EYE APPEAL T206, to be sure! 
$69 DELIVERED via F&F, MO, Pers Ck.

PM/EM me w/ "I'll take it"! It will fit your Fine Collection, I'm sure!
